title Sequence Diagram: 14 Modify Event 

actor "Organizer" as u
image data:image/png;base64, "Web Browser" as w
boundary "<link:_>newView : View " as nv
boundary "<link:_>nv2 : View " as nv2
boundary "<link:_>: DispatchServlet" as d
entity "<link:_>m : Model" as m
entity "<link:_>m2 : Model" as m2

control "<link:_>: EventController" as ec

entity "<link:_>edto : ModifyEventDTO" as edto

entity "<link:_>edto : ErrorModifyEventDTO" as edto


control "<link:_>: EventController" as ec

participant "<link:_> : EventRepository" as er

participant "<link:_>: EventService" as es

entity "<link:_>v: Event" as e


==1. The organiser select the event they want to modify from the overall view to view details **(18-check-event-organiser)**==


u -> w: click()
activate w

w->d:GET(url : String, data : JSON)
activate d

d->ec:showModifyEvent(eId: long m : Model)
activate ec

ec -> es:e: getEvent(eId: long)
activate es
es -> er: e:= findEventByEventId(eId: long)
es --> ec:return e
deactivate es

ec->m: addAttribute("event" : String, e : Event)

ec->*edto: ModifyEventDTO()
activate edto

edto-->ec:
deactivate edto
ec->m: addAttribute("edto" : String, edto : ModifyEventDTO)

ec-->d:return "modify-event" **(19-modify-event-organiser)**
deactivate ec
d->*nv:View(model : Model)
activate nv


nv-->d:
deactivate nv

d-->w:return newView
deactivate d

==2. The system enter the edit venue page **(19-modify-event-organiser)**\n3. The organiser modifies the details of the event and select the save functionality==

u -> w: click()

w->d:POST(url : String, data : JSON)
activate d

d->ec:modifyEvent(vdto : ModifyEventDTO, m2 : Model)

activate ec

ec -> es: e := getEvent(eventName : String)

ec -> es: modifyEvent(edto : ModifyEventDTO, e : Event)

activate es
es->e:setName(newEventName: String)
es->e:setDescription(newDescription: String)
es->e:setDate(date: LocalDate)

es->e:setStartTime(startTime: LocalTime)

es->e:setEndTime(endtTime: LocalTime)

es->e:setStandingNumberAvailable(standingNumberAvailable: Int)

es->e:setSeatingNumberAvailable(seatingNumberAvailable: Int)

es->e:setPremiumNumberAvailable(premiumNumberAvailable: Int)

es->er:save(e: Event)

es-->ec:
deactivate es





ec->m2: addAttribute("event" : String, e : Event)



ec-->d:return "event-details" **(18 - check - event - organiser)**
deactivate ec
d->*nv2:View(m2 : Model)
activate nv2


nv2-->d:
deactivate nv2

d-->w:return nv2
deactivate d

==4. The system updates the display to show the current event details **(18 - check - event - organiser)**==
